entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
